content: in a magic_ring single_crochet x6 6 round 2 increase x6 12 round 3 to 4 single_crochet x12 12 add a little stuffing round 5 decrease x6 6 fasten_off leaving a yarn tail sew the ball to the tip of the hat collar working with yellow jasper/gold start with a long starting tail chain 34 slip_stitch to the first chain round 1 chain 2 work first stitch into the same stitch half_double_crochet x34 slip_stitch to 1st stitch 34 round 2 chain 2 work first stitch into the same stitch half_double_crochet half_double_crochet-increase x17 51 slip_stitch to 1st stitch fasten_off and weave in the yarn tail with the starting chain attach the collar to the bottom of the head with the thread attach to the hat to create a loop to hang your bauble and that is it you have just made a frenchie christmas bauble don t forget to share your creations tagging @belleandgracehmc so i can see them
